title: Q
data:
==Commands==
*Pressing '''q''' is the command to [[quaff]] (drink) a [[potion]].
*Pressing '''Q''' is the command to [[quiver]] a missile for firing. 
*Pressing '''Ctrl-q''' is the command to [[quit]] the game.

==Symbols==
While playing in console mode:
*'''q''' represents [[list of deep dwarves |deep dwarves]]
*'''Q''' was previously used for queen bees and ants, but is currently unused.
